modName: Radical Remodel - Cities Towns People and stuff
summary: Remodels, rearranges, and relights all cities, towns, and populated buildings in Skyrim.  Also updates all NPCs in those towns.
descriptionHtml:
Why is it, in this land of bandits, dragons, and killers, that shop owners not guard their homes better? 
Why do people have so much random piles of crap in their houses?
How come inns only have the 1 rentable room, and it usually sucks? 
For that matter, where do these random patrons live?  Do they just hang out at the inn all day and night?
When people have all this useless junk in their houses, why is the exterior so empty?
Why is she called Elisif the Fair when she is so ugly?

I Don't Know....But it irritated me, so I changed it.

All your person and town needs in one mod!!
author: Galadreal
